title: Nutrition for sports: facts and fallacies
creator_credit: Stephen Wallen and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Looks at the dietary needs of people involved in physical activity. Discusses the basic components of a balanced diet and clearly shows the misconceptions that the general public has of the athlete’s nutritional requirements.
description: Looks at the dietary needs of people involved in physical activity. Discusses the basic components of a balanced diet and clearly shows the misconceptions that the general public has of the athlete’s nutritional requirements.
